trends: There have been 68 other sightings in Eugene
There were no other sightings in Eugene on or around October 5th 2012
divs: sighting detailsi stay up late and often go outside to view the night sky to contemplate and watch for meteoroids. this particular night i was looking north almost straight up and a bright red orb surrounded with a thin yellowish orange ring suddenly appeared. i was at a very high altitude and in respect to size was probably about the size of a small pill. it was moving somewhat slowly eastward at a downward arc\angle and then seemed to speed up as it moved across the sky. i estimate it was in view for maybe 30 secs. at the most before it suddenly diminished in size and disapeared. a rough estimate of the observed distance travelled is from a 12:00 to 2:30 position looking north at the sky. at first sight, i naturally thought airplane light, but this was too large for a plane light, had the yellowish orange ring around it, and was moving at an odd angle across the sky.
Summary: Round red orb appeared, surrounded by yellow/orange ring, moved east for 30 sec's., sped up & disapeared.
